parameters.name: XAngle
parameters.description: Angle by which to rotate the camera about its x axis

parameters.name: YAngle
parameters.description: Angle by which to rotate the camera about its y axis

title: IModelView.TurnBy
description: Rotates the camera by the specified angles about the camera's x and y axes.
signature:
void TurnBy( 
   System.Double
XAngle
,
   System.Double
YAngle
)

parameters.name: XAngle
parameters.description: Angle by which to rotate the camera about its x axis

parameters.name: YAngle
parameters.description: Angle by which to rotate the camera about its y axis

remarks: The model view must have an active camera.
